content:
Russia has hit the hydraulic structures and dams on Dniproges in Zaporozhye today, but there is no threat of a dam of the dam.

This is stated instatementUkrhydroenergo.

“Unfortunately, there is also a hit on the largest hydroelectric power station of Ukraine - Dniproges in Zaporozhye. The inhumans did not calm down, destroying the Kakhovka hydroelectric power station, and now they are trying to create a new environmental disaster, cynically hitting the Dniproges and Plotgins on hydraulic structures, ”the statement said.

It is reported that the fire is currently ongoing. Extraordinary services and energy work, overcoming the consequences of numerous air strikes.

“There is no threat of breakthrough. The situation on the station of the station is controlled, ”Ukrhydroenergo said.

As reported by the Armyinform, RussiaShe has done12 rocket strokes in Zaporozhye, attacked energy objectsSumy regionand Kharkiv region.

In the Lviv region happenedThe drilling of droneinto the object of energy infrastructure.
